solution_line_template: In total Billie bakes {pies_per_day} x {baking_days} = <<{pies_per_day}*{baking_days}={total_pies_baked}>>{total_pies_baked} pies.
After Tiffany eats the pies, this many pies are in the refrigerator: {total_pies_baked} - {tiffany_ate_pies} = <<{total_pies_baked}-{tiffany_ate_pies}={remaining_pies}>>{remaining_pies} pies.
She needs to buy this many cans of whipped cream {remaining_pies} x {cans_per_pie} = <<{remaining_pies}*{cans_per_pie}={total_cans_needed}>>{total_cans_needed} cans.
